title: LWN.net Weekly Edition for March 26, 2015 [LWN.net]
excerpt: The Arduino has been one of the biggest success stories of the open-hardware movement, but that success does not protect it from internal conflict. In recent months, two of the project's founders have come into conflict about the direction of future effortsâ€”and that conflict has turned into a legal dispute about who owns the rights to the Arduino trademark.
